en.title: Vmall Platform
en.summary: Create immersive 3D virtual malls, shops, and exhibitions using Matterport technology
en.description:
# Vmall Platform

Transform physical spaces into stunning 3D digital experiences.

## Features
- Matterport 3D scanning
- Interactive hotspots
- Multi-language support
- E-commerce integration
- Analytics dashboard

en.title: Arabiq AI Suite
en.summary: Arabic-first AI tools: voice narration, chatbots, recommendations, and analytics
en.description:
# Arabiq AI Suite

Intelligent Arabic language AI for MENA markets.

## Modules
- Voice AI narration
- Conversational chatbot
- Smart recommendations
- Vision AI

en.title: Arabiq Commerce
en.summary: Complete e-commerce backend with MENA payment gateways and shipping
en.description:
# Arabiq Commerce

Full e-commerce platform for Arab markets.

## Features
- PayTabs, PayFort, Moyasar integration
- Aramex, DHL shipping
- Multi-currency support
- VAT compliance

End-to-end 3D capture services.

## Services
- Professional Matterport scanning
- Post-production enhancement
- Cloud hosting with CDN

en.title: VFair Edition

## Features
- Virtual booths
- Live networking
- Streaming with Q&A
